name: Merchandising services consultant
description:
MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Discover and realize selling opportunities for retailers & manufacturers across the Russian region
  • Discover clients’ needs and provide relevant solutions based on experts’ support
  • Manage special projects according to the client’s objectives and timelines
  • Develop the materials of the product portfolio to engage the Clients
  • Organize and perform special events (webinars, personal client meetings, etc.) to activate sales opportunities
  • Prepare and help to adopt global presentations for local clients to maintain and strengthen the awareness of the solutions you are in charge
  • Prepare and perform live demonstrations both offline and online for the clients based on insightful analysis of client business issues
  • Maintain sales administration procedures
  • Manage revenue & forecasting procedures on a regular basis
  • Develop effective working relationships within technical teams and Global Product Leaders to prepare Sales proposals for the Client

MAIN OBJECTIVES 2021

NielsenIQ merchandising services revenue growth through current contracts maintenance and new projects development

Clients satisfaction

REQUIREMENTS

  • English upper intermediate (written, oral)
  • Higher education
  • IT solution sales experience (discovering, presentation, consultancy, negotiation, etc.)
  • Experience working with or in retailer merchandizing departments
  • Technical integration project maintenance
  • Good communication skills, team work experience, ability to manage tasks on their own
  • Discipline, accuracy, attention to detail

ABOUT NielsenIQ

We are the most trusted source for complete consumer intelligence as we have for nearly 100 years. Our ability to provide global retailers, manufacturers and partners with the most comprehensive data, analysis and insights will remain unmatched.

We deliver the complete truth. That’s why we are unrelenting in our pursuit of the most comprehensive data sets, measuring all transactions equally to deliver the knowledge people need. Our best-in-class data scientists and analysts simplify the complexity of this information, illuminating powerful insights through clear, compelling stories. We capture the world as it truly is to enable leaders to look forward and empower businesses to make decisions with confidence.

Check our current job openings now to begin your NielsenIQ journey.
